lead_paragraph: The Russian Parliament adopted an anti-doping bill Thursday that includes prison terms for coaches found guilty of coercing young athletes into using performance-enhancing drugs.

headline.print_headline: Russia Approves Anti-Doping Law Targeting Coaches
headline.main: Russia Approves Anti-Doping Law Targeting Coaches

snippet: The Russian Parliament adopted an anti-doping bill Thursday that includes prison terms for coaches found guilty of coercing young athletes into using performance-enhancing drugs....
